list.name: Arcade Mania
list.description: Arcade games are so nostalgic, aren't they!

list.name: Saint Patrick's Day
list.description: Find your four-leaf clover and grab all the rewards!

list.name: Easter Quest
list.description: Easter Bunny is here to bring you lots of sweet rewards!

list.name: Stars and Stripes
list.description: Get ready to show the true strength of American spirit

list.name: Fury Cars: Part 1
list.description: The treacherous path is waiting ahead, but it leads to great rewards for those who survive it!

list.name: Biohazard
list.description: Complete challenges and get the Power Symbol to save the world from a dreadful fate

list.name: World on Fire
list.description: Become a Hero in a World on Fire. Conquer the scorching wastelands and claim your rewards.

list.name: Afer Us
list.description: Embrace Hope in the Empty World After Us. Forge a new path for humanity and scavenge for essential supplies.

list.name: Rebirth
list.description: Missed out on the previous symbols? No problem, because Rebirth has them ALL!

list.name: Big Party 5
list.description: It’s time to bring out the confetti, blow up the balloons, and put on our party hats because RollerCoin is turning Five!

list.name: Cyber Renaissance
list.description: Join Hamster on a thrilling cybernetic journey! Experience the Cyber Renaissance with an epic mining event!

list.name: Fury Cars: Part 2
list.description: Embrace the Legendary Fury Cars Event! Conquer the path of fire and blood!

list.name: Palm Paradise
list.description: Escape to Palm Paradise: A Tropical Adventure Awaits! Pristine beaches and crystal-clear waters full of rewards are calling.

list.name: American Dream
list.description: Make your American Dream a reality, Rollers! Don’t miss the final Progression Event of this Season and a bunch of cool rewards.

list.name: Arcade Mania 2
list.description: Throw off your PCs and let’s party like it’s 1980s. Arcade Mania is back! Old but gold. A bunch of rewards including old-school miners and XP for the new Season are waiting!

list.name: Galaxy Far, Far Away
list.description: It’s not a trap, Roller… A set of new rewards are on their way from the Galaxy Far Far Away!

list.name: Hotline Retrowave
list.description: Ready to Travel Back in Time? Feel the Power of Hotline Retrowave Mining Vibes

list.name: Rising Sun
list.description: Feel the rising sun's warmth while the Sun is Rising! The first Yacht miner is ready to fill your Yacht Club collection!

list.name: Deep Blue Ocean
list.description: Dive into the Deep Blue Ocean and collect all the treasure!

list.name: Miami Heatwave
list.description: Another visit to Miami is clearly what we all need right now, so turn on your radio sit back in your buggy and DRIVE!

list.name: Pandora's Box
list.description: Hey, what enigmatic marvels could be concealed within?

list.name: Electric Paradise
list.description: Step into the world of neon dreams and digital wonders with Electric Paradise!

list.name: Work Hard - Play Hard
list.description: Level up your mining game with a twist of excitement!

list.name: Summer Sunset
list.description: As summer bids farewell, gear up for some scorching mining action with these fiery miners

list.name: Roller Family
list.description: Here, we’re delving into the RollerFamily Progression Event, celebrating the fantastic contributions of our community legends throughout the years

list.name: Life in Colors
list.description: Let's add some color to our daily grind! Complete simple tasks collect points and get amazing rewards!

list.name: Celestial One Hunt
list.description: Let's meet up in space where you can find powerful miners

list.name: Neon Purgatory
list.description: Take a look at our Neon Purgatory and touch the wonderful miners

list.name: Sky Fi Metal
list.description: It's easier than quantum physics, Rollers! The most awesome gravitational miners are waiting for you

list.name: Spooky Scary Skeletons
list.description: Inviting everyone to the graveyard! Dive into quests and seize spine-tingling gifts.

list.name: The Cake is a Lie
list.description: Grab your portal gun and let's dive into some super quests. Who do you think we'll run into along the way?

list.name: Endless Gloss
list.description: The countdown begins NOW, Rollers. 12 hours. 15 levels. a set of amazing rewards.

list.name: Beyond Good AI Evil
list.description: It’s decision time, Rollers! Step into the future, conquer quests, and claim your rewards.

list.name: Thanksgiving
list.description: Hey Rollers! Let's start celebrating today! May your heart be as full as your plate.

list.name: Shopping Mania
list.description: Are you ready for Black Hamsday, Rollers?

list.name: Grand Theft Crypto
list.description: No need to wait, Rollers. It’s coming… 2025 December 7. Have you seen THAT trailer?

list.name: CyberPenguin Adventure
list.description: Many fear being left on the same iceberg, will you take the risk?

list.name: Jack of all Traders
list.description: Gear up and boost those GPUbits to Epic mode for a shot at the UNREAL Ancient Icecraft in our Event!

list.name: New Year's Eve Story
list.description: New Year is approaching us! Get ready for an exciting 40 levels with amazing rewards.

list.name: Deep Mining
list.description: Shine bright and mine crypto! The dark depths of crystal caves are waiting, somewhere out there

list.name: Candy Dreams
list.description: It’s sweeter than sugar but don’t try licking it! The UNREAL Real Sugar: 3,307,290 Gh/s + 6.5% Bonus!

list.name: Voices of Change
list.description: Ignite the spirit of change. Feel the pulse of Patriot Power: 612 000 Gh/s + a soaring 3% Bonus!

list.name: Crypto Naturalist
list.description: Pack your gear, RollerNaturalists! The crypto jungle awaits!

list.name: Frozen Treasure
list.description: From the frozen darkness it approaches… Grab a BLASTER to defend yourself!

list.name: Forever Blasting
list.description: Ready! Set! Shoot the aliens! Your mission is not over yet, next fight starts NOW!

list.name: Dragons Breath
list.description: Year of the Dragon is upon us, Rollers! Feel the fire breath of the Dragon, Rollers!

list.name: Panem Et Circenses
list.description: Hungry for bread and circuses, Rollers? Let's start off this season with some good fight!

list.name: Pingxi Lantern Festival
list.description: Rollers, It’s time to say the winter farewell. Let's honor it going away by firing up a lantern in the sky.

list.name: Polar Bear Day
list.description: Polar Bear Day is around the corner. Don’t miss the chance to get a frosty Bearish: 1 800 000 Gh/s + 2% Bonus

list.name: Women History Month
list.description: Where there is a woman, there is RollerCoin. FemPride: 800 000 Gh/s + 5% Bonus

list.name: St. Patrick's Day
list.description: The St.Patrick's Day Progression event is going live tomorrow but the celebration starts TODAY

list.name: Pharaoh's Legacy
list.description: Is this a mirage or a chance to fulfill a crypto mission? Time to snatch mythic mining treasure

list.name: The Soon and Moon
list.description: Let the sun boost your mining speed and the moon ease your grind!

list.name: ROFL
list.description: Happy Fool’s Day ya’all! Get ready to chuckle and giggle your way through our freshest rogression event

list.name: Spartan Gym Life
list.description: Gear up, Rollers! All the bros are going to the gym!

list.name: In the Heat of a Disco Night
list.description: Ready to bust out your best disco moves? We’re throwing a Disco Progression party!

list.name: Rock Concert
list.description: Come together, right now, and let’s MINE!

list.name: Fall of Rome
list.description: When the empire crumbled, crypto history was forever changed!

list.name: May the Fourth
list.description: May the 4th be with you and may your crypto investments soar to the stars!

list.name: Kingdom of the Bored Apes
list.description: You might seen a lot of apes, but the most successful of them are bores

list.name: Back to the Roller
list.description: Who wouldn’t want to have their own DeRollean, huh?

list.name: Crypto Fast Food
list.description: Ready to level your party up? It’s all about moving forward and earning rewards.

list.name: Fallout Era
list.description: Are you ready to claim the wasteland as your own?

list.name: Rich Beach
list.description: The beach is calling, and you MUST answer!

list.name: Footbal League
list.description: Lace up for exciting events, support your team, and snatch all these shiny rewards!

list.name: Copa America
list.description: From Pelé to Messi, the legendary tournament is here!

list.name: Multiverse - Batham
list.description: This city is our chessboard, Batham and with every move, he is two steps ahead

list.name: Multiverse - SuperHam
list.description: Calling the Kryptonian Valor. Embark on a Quest to save the Metropolis!

list.name: Independence Day
list.description: Stars, stripes, and everything nice. Let’s make the freedom ring louder than ever.

list.name: Dungeon & Hamsters
list.description: Create your crypto story, and command the fate of BitCoin!

list.name: The Last Train
list.description: Let this one last train be your gateway to the great crypto adventure

list.name: Hams vs Zombies
list.description: Survive the zombie apocalypse to shape the future of humanity and get a bunch of amazing rewards

list.name: Hamwerine & Hampool
list.description: Ready for madness? Hampool and Hamverine are rewriting the crypto rulebook on chaos

list.name: Power Surge
list.description: Ignite the spark, fuel the flame - and be victorious on the Final craft!

list.name: Soul Search
list.description: Hamster’s eyes are windows to the soul, and the BTC you will find in them

list.name: Big Ham War
list.description: True valor is measured not by the battles won, but by the fear overcome

list.name: Space Miner
list.description: What Hmepe brings to you: Incredible Space Miner 1 625 000 Gh/s + 0.50 Bonus

list.name: Mind Miner
list.description: Thump prepared something special for the Mind Stone Progression Event
